A0: Expelled AAP MLA Vinod Kumar Binny
RelatedSentence: New Delhi , May 19 : Expelled AAP MLA Vinod Kumar Binny today called upon BJP , AAP and Congress to consider civil activist Kiran Bedi for the post of Delhi chief minister , saying that holding fresh Assembly elections would be a wastage of public money .
I have written to AAP , BJP , Congress and Independent MLAs to come together and make Bedi the Delhi chief minister as she does n't belong to any political party .
